name: tm26
effect: Teaches Earthquake to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Earthquake to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Causes a quake that has no effect on flying foes.
flavor_text.emerald: Causes a quake that has no effect on flying foes.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An earthquake that strikes all POKéMON in battle excluding the user.
